posts.post_content:
I need the following T210s in any decent condition, graded or ungraded:

Series 4: Aylor, Dougherty, Lux, Orcutt.
Series 5: Cross, Drumm, Duvie, Gilmore, McKevitt.
Series 6: Angermeier (fielding), Goodman, Hicks, Horn, Mulvain, Meyers, Toney, Whitaker.
Series 7: Cantwell, Dobbs, Dwyer, Evans, Galvin, Gillespie, Handibe, Kelly (mascot), Mayer, Merchant, Mills, Morgan, Morris, Munson, O'Halloran, Richardson, Sharp.
Series 8: Bauer, Bay, Burnett, Carson, Collins, Crandall, Demaree, Dobbs, Dunn, Flehary, Greminger, Kerwin, Manuel, McBride, McLaurin, Miller, Osteen, Ower, Patterson, Peters, Phillips, Rementer, Rhodes, Schlitzer, Sid Smith, Thomas (portrait), Walker, Wanner, Whiteman, Whitney.

PM me what you have for sale, condition and asking price. Thanks.
Bob M.
Got a few cards for you, Bob. Sent you a pm.

Thanks so much David. Hope to see you at the National in Chicago next summer.
Bob
